settings.title: FEATURES, SPECS & MATERIALS
settings.content:
All Sandbags come with 4 sets of flexible, soft-grip handles (8 total) Neutral Grips, Barbell Grips, Suitcase Grips, End Cap Grips

1000D Military-Spec Cordura

Military Grade Velcro

5 Panel Seatbelt Webbing

YKK Zippers


SCOUT:

Maximum Dimensions: 18" x 9" based on stretched shell
Filler Bags: (1) Double Velcro 30lb. filler bag Included in kit 

ATHLETE:

Maximum Dimensions: 30" x 13" based on stretched shell
Filler Bag: (1) Double Velcro 50lb. bag included

STRONGMAN:

Maximum Dimensions: 36" x 26" based on stretched shell
Filler Bags: (2) Double Velcro 70-75lb. bags

settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content: Brute Force offers free shipping in the Continental United States on all Equipment. *Apparel not included.

settings.subtitle: A NEW LOOK AT TRAINING
settings.title: BUILDING ADAPTIVE CAPACITY
settings.text: Brute Force is the leader in Unstable Load Systems (ULS™️) and Unstable Load Training (ULT™️), combining a series of practices to expand your Adaptive Capacity and enable you to perform at the top of your game in any condition imaginable.

settings.subtitle: NEW INNOVATIONS
settings.title: ADAPATIVE FILLERS
settings.text: Make sure to add our 5lbs ADAPTIVE FILLERS for rapid weight changes during your workout.
